topics.name: weather
messages: I am surprised to say the weather was better.
The weather was balmy, adding to the enjoyment of the day.
The weather is supposed to be nice this weekend.
The weather made outdoor activities unrealistic.
It was the weather that made her so irritable.
The weather had turned sultry but there was a cool breeze out on the patio by the barbecue.
The dry weather was perfect for building.
The weather had cleared again since noon.
He remembered only the dull gray weather.
The national weather forecast on television was calling for light snow in Arkansas.
The weather was already growing wintry and morning frosts congealed an earth saturated by autumn rains.
In spite of the mud and weather, she felt much better.
In the right stage of the weather a pond fires its evening gun with great regularity.
As the weather improved, the goats began kidding in earnest.

topics.name: covid
messages: Victoria has 797 new COVID19 cases and eight deaths.
Covid booster jabs set to be given to people in their 50s as NPHET give stark warning.
Austria introduces lockdown for unvaccinated.
Europe should be wary of possible new Covid variants.
Why is Europe the Covid epicentre once again?
Coronavirus cases declining everywhere except Europe.
The UK has one of the highest Covid infection rates in the world right now.
COVID19 vaccines can help prevent new variants from emerging
COVID19 vaccines do not change or interact with your DNA in any way.
Older adults are more likely than younger, healthier people to experience serious illness from COVID19.
All three vaccines are safe and effective at preventing hospitalization and death.
Fully vaccinated people with breakthrough infections are less likely to develop serious illness from COVID19 than unvaccinated people.
People with COVID19 have reported a wide range of symptoms .
A COVID19 test can help you determine if you have an infection.

topics.name: goats
messages: Goats were one of the first animals to be tamed by humans and were being herded 9000 years ago.
Goat meat is the most consumed meat per capita worldwide.
Goats have a gestation period (pregnancy) of five month.
Goats are herd animals and will become depressed if kept without any goat companions.
This unusual shape, shared by sheep and several other ungulates, gives them a fuller range of vision than humans and other animals with round pupils.
The four chambered stomach helps goats digest tough roughage like grass and hay.
Around the globe more people eat and drink meat and milk from goats than any other animal.

topics.name: cats
messages: The genome of a cat is 95 percent tiger, and they share many behaviors with their jungle ancestors.
Cats are believed to be the only mammals who do not taste sweetness.
Cats are nearsighted, but their peripheral vision and night vision are much better than that of humans.
Cats can jump up to six times their length.
The collarbone of a cat does not connect to their other bones.
Cats have an extra organ that allows them to taste scents on the air.
Cats have 230 bones, while humans only have 206.
The claws of the cats are all curve downward.
Cats are supposed to have 18 toes.
